title.rendered: This Instagram Artist Turns Food Into Cartoon Characters: Internet Can’t Have Enough | Viral News

content.rendered:
The reel has more than 42 million views

An Australian-based artist is taking the internet by storm with his remarkable approach to food presentation. With his innovative techniques, this artist is making waves, drawing widespread attention for his extraordinary culinary creations.

Laleh Mohmedi, hailing from Melbourne and with the Instagram handle @jacobs_food_diaries, uses food items as her medium to skillfully craft intricate depictions of popular cartoon characters. In a recent reel shared on her social media account, Mohmedi showcased her talent by creating Heihei, the beloved rooster character from Disney’s Moana.

The viral video captures her creative process as she arranges fresh herbs, thinly sliced carrots, mushrooms, noodles, boiled eggs, red bell peppers, and other ingredients onto an empty plate, transforming them into the recognisable likeness of Heihei. To complete the masterpiece, Mohmedi adds a finishing touch by pouring hot broth in the background, adding depth and texture to her culinary creation.

Many users took to the comments section to appreciate this food art.

“My three-year-old is obsessed with this video. He asked to watch it all the time,” an Instagram user wrote, and another added, “Oh my…he is way too cute to eat!” A user wrote, “Every time you place that first ingredient down, I try and guess what you are up to! I love this,” and another added, “I don’t know how I ended up here, but I’m glad I did! Thank you, algorithm!”

On Laleh Mohmedi’s Instagram page, a plethora of remarkable cartoon characters come to life through the medium of food. Take a look at some of the creations.
